name: A Parliament Is A Machine For Living In
description:
This is a true virtual reality NFT extension of the original 1/1 piece of the same name on Foundation. Read more on yungtochan.com.

If you have a VR headset, use Firefox or Firefox Reality to view, then click the VR button to experience from the inside. On browser, use mouse and WASD keys.

--

On the 6th of January 2021, the US Capitol was under attack.

This artwork revisits the attack via orthographic projection, borrowing from Modernist architect Le Corbusier’s 1923 slogan “A house is a machine for living in”.
